concept_data.title: regions of the Republic of Croatia

summary: The concept "regions of the Republic of Croatia" pertains to the administrative divisions within Croatia, categorized under the broader classification of "regions of EU Member States." This term is a redirect to the preferred term "regions of Croatia," which is utilized in EU legal and regulatory contexts. Understanding these regions is essential for various EU policies, funding allocations, and regional development initiatives. The legal framework governing these regions is influenced by EU regulations that aim to promote cohesion and sustainable development across Member States. Consequently, the regions play a significant role in the implementation of EU directives and the integration of local governance within the European Union.
